title: Drawing, "Parfums Caron, Paris Advertisement: N'Aimez que Moi", ca. 1920s–30s
medium: Brush and blue, pink and yellow gouache, brush and ink, graphite on off-white wove paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: In black ink on the bottom right, reading: "parfums Caron/ Paris/ N'AIMEZ QUE MOI [Caron perfumes/ Paris/ Love no one but me]
description: French advertisement for perfume, in which an abstract floral design in pastel colors is superimposed by wording in black ink on the bottom right, reading: "parfums Caron/ Paris/ N'AIMEZ QUE MOI

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Parfums Caron, Paris Advertisement: N'Aimez que Moi", ca. 1920s–30s.
ca. 1920s–30s. Brush and blue, pink and yellow gouache, brush and ink, graphite on off-white wove paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-70.
